label: General Resume | Jacob Locke
objective: Seeking a position at Technology Corp  where I can apply my superior technology skills to ensure a high level of efficiency and productivity.
profile: Passionate, results driven, highly motivated, self starter seeking a position where I can apply my software design and development skills to solve complex problems, and work with really cool technology.

experience.title: Firmware Engineer
experience.description: Developed and validated firmware for Intel's MTL, ARL, and NVL projects. Feature owner for 'Reset' feature. Owned and maintained the code coverage toolchain. Responsible for weekly code coverage releases and coordinating with other clusters to increases coverage numbers.
results: Drove increase of code coverage metrics to over 95% and developed automated scripts to decrease computation time by over 90%

experience.title: Validation Engineer
experience.description: Validated hardware and software test cases for Intel's Dynamic Tuning product. Found and filed bugs to ensure quality and timely releases of project milestones.

experience.title: Mobile Apps Team Intern
experience.description: Developed new UI components and system features for Roblox's universal messenger app to enable cross-platform communication between PC, console, and mobile devices.

experience.title: Game Engine Team Intern
experience.description: Developed new features for the Roblox game engine. Created new tools to empower game developers.
results: Led project to create new V2 in-game chat system and drove delivery
Developed new in-game HTTP Service to add support for REST API, and robust headers

projects.title: Soundcloud-Lib
projects.description: Created after Soundcloud deleted my approved API app so that my Discord bot project could continue to play music in voice channels. Scrapes a public API key from the Soundcloud site and uses it to access the private API.
features: Creates an MP3 with embedded metadata (title, artist, album art)

projects.title: Sling
projects.description: A room based sharing and collaboration site that features, Text, Audio, and Video Chat, File Sharing, and Desktop sharing via a Chrome extension.  Most realtime communication went over WebSockets, but video and audio data was transmitted peer to peer.  Anyone could make or join a room without an account and room access was granted via share codes.
features: Securely share Text, File, Audio, Webcam, and Desktop data within a Room
Accountless creation and permanent deletion of Rooms

projects.title: PyCodeExec
projects.description: Poorly named library that allows for the safe execution of code from several supported languages via Docker.  This python library spins up a heavily restricted Docker container and executes the provided code.
features: Safely execute and return output from arbitrary code

projects.title: resume-generator
projects.description: A tool I created to allow me to generate custom tailored resumes for different positions.  This resume you are looking at right now was generated with this tool.
features: Uses a data file to populate a template
Everything I could possibly want to change is a parameter in that data file

name: General Resume | Jacob Locke
